tests.name: Super Quick Test
tests.description: A test that completes almost instantly.

tests.name: Test Simple Event Wait
tests.description: Checks if waitForEvent correctly pauses and resumes on a custom event.

tests.name: Rules Reload Test
tests.description: Tests the loadDefaultRules() function to ensure it properly loads the default rules.json file and waits for completion.

tests.name: Library Location Accessibility Test
tests.description: Verifies that Library region and location accessibility are properly separated. Expected: Library region reachable, Library location unreachable.

tests.name: Location Panel Basic Functionality
tests.description: Tests basic functionality of the Location Panel including UI elements and data loading.

tests.name: Library Exit Accessibility Test
tests.description: Verifies that the Library exit shows correct accessibility status, specifically testing the fix for region/location name conflicts.

tests.name: Exit Panel Basic Functionality
tests.description: Tests basic functionality of the Exit Panel including UI elements and data loading.

tests.name: Library Region Accessibility Test (Show All)
tests.description: Verifies that Library region shows as accessible while Library location shows as inaccessible using "Show All Regions" mode.

tests.name: Library Region Accessibility Test (Navigation)
tests.description: Verifies that Library region shows as accessible while Library location shows as inaccessible using Move button navigation.

tests.name: Region Panel Basic Functionality
tests.description: Tests basic functionality of the Region Panel including UI elements and data loading.

tests.name: Show Paths Checkbox
tests.description: Tests the Show Paths checkbox functionality for hiding/showing the full region path.

tests.name: Region Move Event Dispatch
tests.description: Tests that clicking Move buttons dispatches user:regionMove events.

tests.name: Entrance Display
tests.description: Tests that region entrances are displayed with proper formatting and accessibility.

tests.name: Region Move Event Handler Toggle
tests.description: Tests the ability to toggle the regions module event handler for user:regionMove events through the Events panel.

tests.name: Region Move Complete Flow
tests.description: Comprehensive test of region move functionality including event dispatch, state updates, and UI changes.

tests.name: Events Panel Sender/Receiver Display
tests.description: Verifies that modules appearing as both senders and receivers are correctly displayed in the Events panel

tests.name: Events Panel Module Name Tracking
tests.description: Verifies that the Events panel correctly tracks module names and enable/disable functionality works

tests.name: Events Panel Additional Participants
tests.description: Verifies that the Events panel correctly displays non-module publishers and subscribers in the Additional Event Participants section

tests.name: Simple Path Analyzer
tests.description: Very simple test to isolate Path Analyzer issues without state manager.

tests.name: Debug Path Analyzer
tests.description: Simple debug test to isolate Path Analyzer issues.

tests.name: Path Analyzer - Panel Test
tests.description: Opens the Path Analyzer panel and selects a region to analyze.

tests.name: Path Analyzer - Library Test
tests.description: Tests Path Analyzer with Library region (no parentheses).

tests.name: Path Analyzer - Misery Mire (Entrance) Test
tests.description: Tests Path Analyzer with Misery Mire (Entrance) region (with parentheses).

tests.name: Path Analyzer UI - Library Test
tests.description: Tests Path Analyzer UI interaction with Library region (no parentheses).

tests.name: Debug Path Analyzer Library Paths
tests.description: Debug test to check actual DOM structure for Library paths

tests.name: Path Analyzer UI - Misery Mire (Entrance) Test
tests.description: Tests Path Analyzer UI interaction with Misery Mire (Entrance) region (with parentheses).

tests.name: Settings Panel - Colorblind Mode Toggle
tests.description: Tests enabling and disabling colorblind mode for regions via the Settings panel

tests.name: Settings Panel - Load Current Settings
tests.description: Verifies that the Settings panel loads and displays current settings correctly

tests.name: JSON Panel - Import from Text
tests.description: Tests the Import from Text functionality of the JSON panel by exporting settings, modifying them, and importing them back

tests.name: JSON Panel - Layout Import/Export
tests.description: Tests the layout import/export functionality of the JSON panel

tests.name: JSON Panel - Game State Import/Export
tests.description: Tests the game state import/export functionality covering inventory and checked locations

tests.name: Progress Bar Timer Test
tests.description: Tests 5-second timer progress bar with start event and completion event validation

tests.name: Progress Bar Event Mode Test
tests.description: Tests event-driven progress bar with manual progress updates

tests.name: Progress Bar Commands Test
tests.description: Tests show, hide, and destroy commands for progress bars

tests.name: Meta Game Progress Bar Integration Test
tests.description: Tests the metaGame module with progress bar integration using progressBarTest.js configuration

tests.name: Meta Game Panel UI Test
tests.description: Tests the metaGame panel UI elements including dropdown selection, configuration loading, and JSON editing

tests.name: Text Adventure Basic Initialization
tests.description: Tests basic panel initialization, rules loading, and initial display.

tests.name: Text Adventure Custom Data Loading
tests.description: Tests loading and applying custom data files with Adventure-specific messages.

tests.name: Text Adventure Movement Command
tests.description: Tests text command movement ("move GameStart") and region changes.

tests.name: Text Adventure Location Check Command
tests.description: Tests location checking ("check Blue Labyrinth 0") and item discovery.

tests.name: Text Adventure Link Click
tests.description: Tests clicking on exit and location links for movement and checking.

tests.name: Text Adventure Error Handling
tests.description: Tests error handling for invalid commands and inaccessible targets.

tests.name: Text Adventure Iframe Connection
tests.description: Tests iframe adapter, panel creation, and connection establishment.

tests.name: Text Adventure Iframe Basic Initialization
tests.description: Tests basic iframe panel initialization, rules loading, and initial display through iframe.

tests.name: Text Adventure Iframe Custom Data Loading
tests.description: Tests loading and applying custom data files with Adventure-specific messages through iframe.

tests.name: Text Adventure Iframe Movement Command
tests.description: Tests text command movement ("move GameStart") and region changes through iframe.

tests.name: Text Adventure Iframe Location Check Command
tests.description: Tests location checking ("check Blue Labyrinth 0") and item discovery through iframe.

tests.name: Text Adventure Iframe Link Click
tests.description: Tests clicking on exit and location links for movement and checking through iframe.

tests.name: Text Adventure Iframe Manager UI Test
tests.description: Tests using the iframe Manager panel UI to set up and load the text adventure iframe.

tests.name: Iframe Base Connection
tests.description: Tests iframe adapter, panel creation, and connection establishment for iframe-base module.

tests.name: Iframe Base Basic Initialization
tests.description: Tests basic iframe-base panel initialization and status display.

tests.name: Iframe Base Heartbeat Test
tests.description: Tests heartbeat counter functionality in iframe-base module.

tests.name: Iframe Base Connection Status
tests.description: Tests connection status display and module identification in iframe-base.

tests.name: Window Base Connection
tests.description: Tests window adapter, panel creation, and connection establishment for window-base module.

tests.name: Window Base Basic Initialization
tests.description: Tests basic window-base panel initialization and status display.

tests.name: Window Base Heartbeat Test
tests.description: Tests heartbeat counter functionality in window-base module.

tests.name: Window Base Connection Status
tests.description: Tests connection status display and module identification in window-base.

tests.name: Test Spoilers Panel - Full Run
tests.description: Activates the Test Spoilers panel, loads the suggested log, runs the full test, and reports the result.
